subject: Public Speaking
title: Timing and Rhythm
description: Learn Timing and Rhythm in one minute.

hook.text: Comedy has timing. So does storytelling. Every beat matters.

buildup.text: Rush the buildup, ruin the payoff. Take your time.

discovery.text: The audience sets the pace. Watch them and adjust.

twist.text: Rhythm creates a hypnotic quality that holds attention.

climax.text: Practice timing with a stopwatch. Feel the natural pauses.

punchline.text: Master timing. It's the secret ingredient.
